results.definition: intend with some possibility of fulfilment
examples: I hope to have finished this work by tomorrow evening
I hope she understands that she cannot expect a raise

results.definition: grounds for feeling hopeful about the future
United States comedian (born in England) who appeared in films with Bing Crosby (1903-2003)
a specific instance of feeling hopeful
examples: it revived their hope of winning the pennant

results.definition: be optimistic; be full of hope; have hopes
one of the three Christian virtues
someone (or something) on which expectations are centered
examples: he was their best hope for a victory

results.definition: the general feeling that some desire will be fulfilled
examples: in spite of his troubles he never gave up hope
